title: Handle an Appraisal Shortfall
description: The property appraisal comes in below the contract price. The TC must notify the agents and manage the next steps.

tasks.description: Receive the appraisal report and identify that the appraised value is less than the sales price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the appraisal came in $10,000 low.

tasks.description: Immediately send the appraisal report to both the buyer's and seller's agents.
tasks.expected_outcome: The report is securely sent to both agents for their review.

tasks.description: Remind the agents of the three possible outcomes: seller lowers price, buyer brings more cash, or contract cancels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear, neutral summary of the options available to the parties.
